Package de.oth.blocklib.audio

Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.audio.AudioManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AudioManagerService
public class AudioManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements AudioManagerService
Used to load sounds. Defines the position of a listener that should be able to hear sounds. The listener is currently the camera of the scene and its position is updated in the game loop.
Author:
Tobias Mueller
